ai_highlights.headline: Nvidia confirms major investment in OpenAI's latest funding round
ai_highlights.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang announced the company will participate in OpenAI's new funding round, describing it as potentially the 'largest investment we've ever made.' This underscores the deepening ties between the hardware giant and the leading AI lab.

ai_highlights.headline: AI Data Center growth sparks environmental concerns
ai_highlights.summary: New reports highlight the environmental cost of the AI boom, with data center energy demands projected to grow 160% by 2030. Major tech companies are facing challenges in meeting climate pledges due to the explosive expansion of infrastructure.

market_watch.summary: Tech sector focused on strategic AI investments and policy shifts.

items.news: CEO Jensen Huang confirms participation in OpenAI's latest funding round, signaling a massive capital deployment into the AI ecosystem.
Google and other cloud giants set to benefit from India's proposed tax holiday for global cloud providers in the 2026-27 Union Budget.

global_tech.headline: India proposes tax holiday for global cloud providers
global_tech.summary: The Union Budget 2026-27 includes a proposal for a tax holiday until 2047 for global cloud service providers like Microsoft, Google, and Amazon, aiming to boost India-based data center operations.
